effect.shortEffect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
effect.full: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

description.sun-moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
description.sword-shield: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
